resources.string:
Click the start button on the Menu Screen to start

This screen shows a camera view. You can move your device from right to left. The pin icon tells you which direction to go.

If you tilt you device flat a button appears in the bottom left of your screen. This opens a map view of where you are and where to go.

Once you get near to your destination, information will be displayed.

In the settings page you can change options that affect the application.

Firstly you can change the distance at which information appears. This can be set from 1km-5km.

The other option allows you to change the distance displayed from kilometers to miles.

Press the back button on your Android device to return to the Menu screen.

A map view can be opened from the main page when you tilt your device flat. This shows you where you are and where to go.\n\nPinching the screen allows you to zoom. You can also tap the screen and press the zoom in/zoom out buttons.
